name: Fishing Quest
description:
Looking for feedbak on this first Beta version, the game in the future will be published as a android game, but i found that is easier to get reviews of early stages of the game if it is on a web format. Please leave a comment, with your thoughts, critics or suggestions. Thanks!

Obs. Ads will only show up on the mobile version, for now just click it, and you will receive the reward.
